Give your kitchen a complete makeover with this 5 piece cutlery holder from Lock N Lock. This organiser can accommodate your cutlery in the kitchen or also act as a organiser for your office stationery. It is crafted from polycarbonate and the convenience of this utility organiser makes it a must have item.Features
  • Type: Cutlery holder
  • Colour: Blue
  • Material: Polycarbonate
  • Pattern: Solid
  • Size (Length x Width x Height in cms): 28x20x7
  • Contents: 5 piece organiser set with 1 large tray 2 rectangular trays and 2 square trays
Care Tips
Clean with a soft sponge and normal detergent.
Do not use harsh chemicals or products to avoid scratches. Remove unwanted marks by rubbing the utensils with lemon. Ensure that the utensil is dried thoroughly before storing away.
